Package org.moera.lib.node.types.body

Class Body

java.lang.Object
org.moera.lib.node.types.body.Body
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Body extends Object implements Cloneable
Represents the body of a posting or comment in its decoded and encoded forms.

    Converts a Body object to its encoded string representation.

  • Field Details

    • EMPTY

      public static final String EMPTY
      A constant representing an empty JSON object as a string.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Body

      public Body()
      Default constructor for the Body class.

    • Body

      public Body(String encoded)
      Constructs a new Body instance with the provided encoded string. The encoded string is used to initialize the Body object, and the decoding process is triggered to populate its internal state.
      Parameters:
      encoded - the encoded string representing the body content

  • Method Details

    • getEncoded

      public String getEncoded()
      Returns the encoded representation of the Body instance. If the encoded value is not already computed, it triggers the encoding process to generate it.
      Returns:
      the encoded string representation of the body

    • setEncoded

      public void setEncoded(String encoded)
      Updates the encoded string representation of the body content and triggers the decoding process to update the internal state of the object.
      Parameters:
      encoded - the new encoded string representing the body content

    • getSubject

      public String getSubject()
      Retrieves the subject of the body content.
      Returns:
      the subject as a string, or null if the subject is not set

    • setSubject

      public void setSubject(String subject)
      Sets the subject of the body content.
      Parameters:
      subject - the new subject to set for the body content

    • getText

      public String getText()
      Retrieves the textual content of the body.
      Returns:
      the text content as a string, or null if the text is not set

    • setText

      public void setText(String text)
      Sets the textual content of the body.
      Parameters:
      text - the new text content to set

    • getLinkPreviews

      public List<LinkPreview> getLinkPreviews()
      Retrieves a list of link previews associated with the body content. The returned list is immutable and will be empty if no link previews are available.
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of LinkPreview instances, or an empty list if no link previews exist

    • setLinkPreviews

      public void setLinkPreviews(List<LinkPreview> linkPreviews)
      Sets the list of link previews associated with the body content. Each link preview in the provided list is updated to reference the current Body instance as its parent.
      Parameters:
      linkPreviews - the list of LinkPreview instances to associate with the body content

    • getAllText

      public String getAllText()
      Aggregates and returns the combined textual content of the body and its associated link previews. This includes the text content of the body, as well as the titles and descriptions of all associated link previews, concatenated with a space separator. If the body text or link preview fields are empty or null, they are omitted.
      Returns:
      the textual content, or an empty string if no content is available

    • clone

      public Body clone()
      Creates and returns a deep copy of the current Body instance. The cloned instance will have the same encoded representation as the original.
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
      Returns:
      a new Body instance
